title: Call to Karma
description: Believe in Karma? Ever feel like the universe is saying, "Let's see how you deal with this now?" Ever wonder if there is another life out there, one that is so far from what you are presently living? Welcome to Lily's world: an abuse survivor with the demons of her past constantly haunting her, unable to break free from the pattern of loving the wrong men until she meets Raff, a foreign stranger with just as many secrets about his past as she has. She was at the end of her rope and made that one call to Karma in hopes of a change. She never expected her call to Karma to happen so quickly.Will Lily fall for the wrong man again and lose herself forever? Will she succeed at finding her son and finally be able to hold him in her arms again? How precise should she have been when making a call to Karma? Is taking the high road and doing what's right in your heart always the best route? Does Karma really work? Just ask Lily; she knows all too well.
author: S.A. McConnell
